name: Tales Of The Triad (WIP)
description:
**THIS GAME CURRENTLY HAS NO GAMEPLAY AND ONLY HAS A NAVIGABLE UI**

Tales of the Triad is a metroidvania in a fantasy setting where the player can play as 3 characters with unique abilities similar to Trine. Use their unique abilities to solve puzzles, traverse the terrain, and defeat enemies.

In the in-game screen:

- Press K to cause damage to player

- Press L to heal player

- Press Esc to open settings

- Press Tab to open customization window
